page.title: 13RIVER LEVEN-MY PERCEPTIONS
page.content: I HAVE LIVED HERE ALL MY LIFE SO I FEEL PART OF IT,HAVING WITNESSED ITS MANY CHANGES. WEATHER PERMITTING,THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE OFFERS MANY PLEASANT WALKS.MY FAVOURITE IS ALONG THE RIVER LEVEN.DUE TO INCREASING UNEMPLOYMENT I WILL HAVE TO MOVE UNLESS A SUITABLE JOB OCCURS,WHEN I WOULD DEFINITELY STAY.AT 16 I AM AWARE OF THE GOOD AND BAD OF THE AREA.IT'S SAD TO SEE THE OPEN COUNTRYSIDE ENVELOPED BY "SHOE-BOX" HOUSES AND THE RATE OF VANDALISM IS CONSTANTLY INCREASING. I LIVE IN WEST PARK,LESLIE AND FORTUNATELY COMMUNITY SPIRIT SURVIVES, MAKING IT A FRIENDLY PLACE BUT WITHOUT ENTERTAINMENT FOR MY AGE.IN TWO YEARS TIME I CAN GO TO DISCOS IN GLENROTHES. I LOVE THE AREA I LIVE IN AND HAVE BEEN BROUGHT UP IN,BUT ISN'T EVERYONE THE SAME?
